title: Dzulu ya virusi vya K’orona
licenseNotes: Uts’igaluze udzumbe wa kazi yiyi, ela unaidima kuutafusiri, ukauhumira kwa njira zinjine, na ukaugot’eza hebu kuweneza kwa lengo ra kuts’auguza. Ni seti uzirinde zo haki na sifa za mwandiki wa chitabu na mwandiki wa p’icha Weiman Kou
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

8.dug: Translated by Lilian Nyanje, Samuel Zaka & Hamisi Askari

9.dug: Translated by Lilian Nyanje, Samuel Zaka & Hamisi Askari

12.dug: Kuna chit’u CHIMWENGA tu uhenzwacho uchimanye dzulu ya jisi chirusi cha k’orona
12.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

13.dug: Kuna chit’u CHIMWENGA tu uhenzwacho uchimanye dzulu ya jisi chirusi cha k’orona
13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

28.dug: Cho chirusi chinagot’a chikala madenwa gaga

29.dug: Cho chirusi chinagot’a chikala madenwa gaga

30.dug: Fyalaluka k’anda. Mita 2 zinaidima kukwika salama kulaa kwa madenwa mabomu.
30.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

31.dug: Fyalaluka k’anda. Mita 2 zinaidima kukwika salama kulaa kwa madenwa mabomu.
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

38.dug: Kwa vivyo uchona mut’u lwazu-lwazu unakohola/ unach’emula/ni mukongo unaidima kutsagula ku:
38.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

39.dug: Kwa vivyo uchona mut’u lwazu-lwazu unakohola/ unach’emula/ni mukongo unaidima kutsagula ku:
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.dug: Aphe vitambaa vya kufunga p’ula na mulomo/masiki. Anaidima kukoholera hebu akach’emulira na kurinda chila mut’u ariye phephi
40.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

41.dug: Aphe vitambaa vya kufunga p’ula na mulomo/masiki. Anaidima kukoholera hebu akach’emulira na kurinda chila mut’u ariye phephi
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

48.dug: Phanjine hata ts’i mukongo, ela mwenye yunadzirinda tu.
48.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

49.dug: Phanjine hata ts’i mukongo, ela mwenye yunadzirinda tu.
49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.dug: At’u odziambukizwa anaidima kuts’aonyesa dalili, ela acheri anaambukiza
50.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

51.dug: At’u odziambukizwa anaidima kuts’aonyesa dalili, ela acheri anaambukiza
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.dug: Na kwa jumula, ni azo idzo kudzitenga na virundu, kwa kukala k’umanya ni ani ariye ni mukongo.
52.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

53.dug: Na kwa jumula, ni azo idzo kudzitenga na virundu, kwa kukala k’umanya ni ani ariye ni mukongo.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

58.dug: Mikowa kahi za gari ya moshi

59.dug: Mikowa kahi za gari ya moshi

60.dug: Vidude vya kufyeha vya mashine ya kupandira na kutsererera gorofani

61.dug: Vidude vya kufyeha vya mashine ya kupandira na kutsererera gorofani

68.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

80.dug: Hata vivyo, ukati unjine mahe ga mut’u mukongo ganaidima kugwerera vit’u vinjine…
80.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

81.dug: Hata vivyo, ukati unjine mahe ga mut’u mukongo ganaidima kugwerera vit’u vinjine…
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

88.dug: Na uchigwira zani chit’u chochosi kati ya vivi, chidzako ukumbe usoo,
88.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

89.dug: Na uchigwira zani chit’u chochosi kati ya vivi, chidzako ukumbe usoo,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.dug: na njira ya tende ya kuvyusa ni kuvyoga na sabuni, jik’i, hebu uchi.
90.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

91.dug: na njira ya tende ya kuvyusa ni kuvyoga na sabuni, jik’i, hebu uchi.
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.dug: Virusi vinaidima kukala kwa masaa machache dzulu ya vit’u
92.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

93.dug: Virusi vinaidima kukala kwa masaa machache dzulu ya vit’u
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

98.dug: Ndo mana ni vidzo piya kutuwa yiyi
98.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

99.dug: Ndo mana ni vidzo piya kutuwa yiyi
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.en: wash with soap up to here

101.en: wash with soap up to here

106.dug: Uts’ikumbe usoo. (Hebu uso wa munzio.) Ichikala ni seti ukumbe, oga mikonoyo na sabuni chividzo kwanza.
106.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

107.dug: Uts’ikumbe usoo. (Hebu uso wa munzio.) Ichikala ni seti ukumbe, oga mikonoyo na sabuni chividzo kwanza.
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.dug: Ukati wa kutosha wa kwimba, “Ts’iku ya raha ya kuvyalwa” k’ano mbiri
108.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

109.dug: Ukati wa kutosha wa kwimba, “Ts’iku ya raha ya kuvyalwa” k’ano mbiri
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

116.en: wash the back of your hands

117.en: wash the back of your hands

120.dug: Uchikala udzikumba, uts’ijali. We chidzako oga mikonoyo na sabuni.
120.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

121.dug: Uchikala udzikumba, uts’ijali. We chidzako oga mikonoyo na sabuni.
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.dug: Chisha, uts’ikumbe konze ya masiki ichikala vindaidimikika.
122.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

123.dug: Chisha, uts’ikumbe konze ya masiki ichikala vindaidimikika.
123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

126.dug: Vidudu vinakula ndani ya masikiyo uchikala undazivala muno.
126.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

127.dug: Vidudu vinakula ndani ya masikiyo uchikala undazivala muno.
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.dug: Tsupha vitambaa vya kufunga p’ula na mulomo/masiki uchisikira zitsoka. Uts’izivale zaidi ya ts’iku mwenga!
128.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

129.dug: Tsupha vitambaa vya kufunga p’ula na mulomo/masiki uchisikira zitsoka. Uts’izivale zaidi ya ts’iku mwenga!
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

140.dug: Uts’irye leu phamwenga na at’u, hebu mukats’anganya viya, vikombe hebu t’aulo.
140.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

141.dug: Uts’irye leu phamwenga na at’u, hebu mukats’anganya viya, vikombe hebu t’aulo.
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.dug: Kw’idima kukumba usoo na chikokorito hata ukakala wajeza.
142.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

143.dug: Kw’idima kukumba usoo na chikokorito hata ukakala wajeza.
143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.dug: Fugula na kufunga muyango na chikokorito hebu mafuzi kurichisa mikono pharipho yinaidimikika.
144.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

145.dug: Fugula na kufunga muyango na chikokorito hebu mafuzi kurichisa mikono pharipho yinaidimikika.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

148.en: and after being out in the public

149.en: and after being out in the public

152.dug: Chila ukati oga mikonoyo na sabuni…
152.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

153.dug: Chila ukati oga mikonoyo na sabuni…
153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

164.dug: Soma vitabumajarida kwa utumia unji Zaidi!
164.en: Read the articles for more tips!

165.dug: Soma vitabumajarida kwa utumia unji Zaidi!
